snippet: The police said Ruben Ubiles set fire to 12 mezuzot, religious ornaments that many Jews affix to their door frames, at a public-housing complex.
abstract: New York City Police Dept officials say that Ruben Ubiles of Bedford-Stuyvesant has been charged with three hate crimes in the burning of a dozen mezuzot in a public-housing complex in Williamsburg; religious ornaments contain Scripture and adorn the door-ways of many Jews.
lead_paragraph: The police said Ruben Ubiles set fire to 12 mezuzot, religious ornaments that many Jews affix to their door frames, at a public-housing complex.

headline.seo: Brooklyn Man Charged With Hate Crimes in Mezuzot Burnings
